base-sepolia.notes: TestUSDC deployed for MVP testing with unlimited minting. To verify contracts, get a valid Basescan API key from https://basescan.org/myapikey and update .env, then run: forge verify-contract 0x2d04a1dF447A9265Bc936747f1CEe7126e99aaFe src/TestUSDC.sol:TestUSDC --chain base-sepolia && forge verify-contract 0x747988d925e8eeC76CF1E143307630dD8BE4bFff src/MicroLoanFactory.sol:MicroLoanFactory --chain base-sepolia --constructor-args $(cast abi-encode 'constructor(address)' 0x2d04a1dF447A9265Bc936747f1CEe7126e99aaFe)
